entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning near noon then changing to snow this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
